description.value:
Ghald makes three attacks, one with his bite and two with his shortswords.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: [[/damage 2d4 + @mod type=piercing average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: [[/damage 2d6 + @mod type=piercing average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one Medium or Small creature against which Ghald has advantage on the attack roll. Hit: [[/damage 2d4 + @mod type=bludgeoning average=true]] damage, and the target is &Reference[grappled]{grappled} (escape DC 15). Until the grapple ends, the target can’t breathe, and Ghald has advantage on attack rolls against it.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Assassinate. During its first turn, Ghald has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn’t taken a turn. Any hit Ghald scores against a surprised creature is a critical hit.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Limited Amphibiousness. Ghald can breathe air and water, but he needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Shark Telepathy. Ghald can magically command any shark within 120 feet of him, using a limited telepathy.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Sneak Attack. Ghald deals an extra [[/damage 4d6 average=true]] damage when he hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of Ghald’s that isn’t &Reference[incapacitated]{incapacitated} and Ghald doesn’t have disadvantage on the attack roll.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].
